name: Sri Lanka Provinces Match Free
description: Learn while you play, play while you learn! Are you a curious person with a strong interest in the Provinces & territories of Sri Lanka? Why not play a game, have fun and while going that, test your knowledge and learn. Now, all NEW Sri Lanka Provinces Geography Match FREE game is available. An addictive memory game that helps you learn Sri Lanka Provinces' capitals, flags, and maps while you play and beat your previous high scores. Match the entries on each section and match them before time runs out. If you get it wrong, remember what you saw, because the next time you want to match, your good memory will be rewarded. Topics covered: Sri Lanka's State or territory... and match it with its * Capital city * Flag * Map Sharpen your mind and fingers and learn about Sri Lanka!
